title: Vertex Schema for GOV.UK
description: GOV.UK content object representation as stored in Google Vertex AI Enterprise Search

content_id.description: Unique content ID from the Publishing API (for debugging/retrieving single objects)

title.description: The main title (shown in search results)

description.description: A short description (shown in search results)

additional_searchable_text.$comment: We've decided not to use this as structured fields don't contribute enough to relevance. Vertex does not support removing a field from the schema (as of Jan 2024) so it stays here.
additional_searchable_text.description: Additional textual content such as keywords that should be searchable but don't form part of the main body of content

link.description: URI reference either as a relative path for GOV.UK content, or as an absolute URL for external content (used to link to the content from search results)

url.description: Absolute URL including protocol and host even for content on GOV.UK proper (used for Vertex to incorporate popularity/event signals)

public_timestamp.description: Unix timestamp of when this object was last updated (for sorting/filtering/boosting)

public_timestamp_datetime.description: RFC3339 timestamp of when this object was last updated (for boosting and displaying)

part_of_taxonomy_tree.description: A list of GOV.UK taxon IDs that this content object is tagged to (for filtering)

is_historic.description: Whether the content is historic (for boosting; boosts don't support boolean)

organisation_state.description: The state of the organisation (for boosting)

government_name.description: The name of the government under which the content was originally created (shown as part of search result if present)

locale.description: The locale of the content (not used yet, may be useful for i18n later)

parts.description: A list of parts (shown below search result if present)

organisations.description: A list of organisation slugs this content belongs to (for filtering)

topical_events.description: A list of topical events slugs this content belongs to (for filtering)

world_locations.description: A list of world locations slugs this content belongs to (for filtering)

manual.description: The manual this content belongs to (if applicable) (for filtering)

payload_version.$comment: We've decided not to use this in the end as there isn't enough of a risk and we cannot guarantee atomic writes anyway. It is now included in the `debug` object field. Vertex does not support removing a field from the schema (as of Jan 2024) so it stays here.
payload_version.description: Incrementing document version number (used to avoid document update race conditions)

debug.description: Metadata that is only used for debugging purposes

payload_version.description: Incrementing version number of an export run from Publishing API

last_synced_at.description: Timestamp of when this document was last synced to Vertex
